verses.verse: וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> set forward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> [by] Jericho ס

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw בָּלָ֖ק <WH1111> And Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צִפּ֑וֹר <WH6834> of Zippor אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> had done יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> all that Israel לָֽאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> to the Amorites

וַיָּ֨גָר <WH1481> afraid מוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> And Moab מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> of הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was sore כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רַב־ <WH7227> because they [were] many ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיָּ֣קָץ <WH6973> was distressed מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> and Moab מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because of בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מוֹאָ֜ב <WH4124> And Moab אֶל־ <WH413> to זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> unto the elders מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> of Midian עַתָּ֞ה <WH6258> Now יְלַחֲכ֤וּ <WH3897> lick up הַקָּהָל֙ <WH6951> Now shall this company אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִ֣יבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH5439> all [that are] round about כִּלְחֹ֣ךְ <WH3897> licketh up הַשּׁ֔וֹר <WH7794> us as the ox אֵ֖ת <WH853> יֶ֣רֶק <WH3418> the grass הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field וּבָלָ֧ק <WH1111> And Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צִפּ֛וֹר <WH6834> of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> [was] king לְמוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of the Moabites בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> He sent מַלְאָכִ֜ים <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֣ם <WH1109> therefore unto Balaam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּע֗וֹר <WH1160> of Beor פְּ֠תוֹרָה <WH6604> to Pethor אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is near הַנָּהָ֛ר <WH5104> which [is] by the river אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> of his people לִקְרֹא־ <WH7121> to call ל֑וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> him saying הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold עַ֣ם <WH5971> Behold there is a people יָצָ֤א <WH3318> come out מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> from Egypt הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold כִסָּה֙ <WH3680> behold they cover אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ין <WH5869> the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and they יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> and they abide מִמֻּלִֽי׃ <WH4136> over against

וְעַתָּה֩ <WH6258> Now לְכָה־ <WH1980> come נָּ֨א <WH4994> please אָֽרָה־ <WH779> now therefore I pray thee curse לִּ֜י אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> me this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since עָצ֥וּם <WH6099> for they [are] too mighty הוּא֙ <WH1931> they מִמֶּ֔נִּי <WH4480> are too אוּלַ֤י <WH194> perhaps אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> for me peradventure I shall prevail נַכֶּה־ <WH5221> [that] we may smite בּ֔וֹ וַאֲגָרְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <WH1644> them and [that] I may drive them out מִן־ <WH4480> are too הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּ֣י <WH3588> since יָדַ֗עְתִּי <WH3045> for I wot אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom תְּבָרֵךְ֙ <WH1288> that he whom thou blessest מְבֹרָ֔ךְ <WH1288> [is] blessed וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom תָּאֹ֖ר <WH779> and he whom thou cursest יוּאָֽר׃ <WH779> is cursed

וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> departed זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> And the elders מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab וְזִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and the elders מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> of Midian וּקְסָמִ֖ים <WH7081> with the rewards of divination בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> in their hand וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they came אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and spake אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> unto him the words בָלָֽק׃ <WH1111> of Balak

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to לִ֤ינוּ <WH3885> unto them Lodge פֹה֙ <WH6311> here הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> here this night וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <WH7725> again אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> you word כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> shall speak יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> abode שָׂרֵֽי־ <WH8269> unto me and the princes מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab עִם־ <WH5973> with בִּלְעָֽם׃ <WH1109> with Balaam

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> unto Balaam וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מִ֛י <WH4310> Who הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> What men הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> are these עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said בִּלְעָ֖ם <WH1109> And Balaam אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto God בָּלָ֧ק <WH1111> Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צִפֹּ֛ר <WH6834> of Zippor מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> hath sent אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הָעָם֙ <WH5971> Behold [there is] a people הַיֹּצֵ֣א <WH3318> come out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיְכַ֖ס <WH3680> which covereth אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֣ין <WH5869> the face הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now לְכָ֤ה <WH1980> come קָֽבָה־ <WH6895> now curse לִּי֙ אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אוּלַ֥י <WH194> perhaps אוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> me them peradventure I shall be able לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> to overcome בּ֖וֹ וְגֵרַשְׁתִּֽיו׃ <WH1644> them and drive them out

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֔ם <WH1109> unto Balaam לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> go עִמָּהֶ֑ם <WH5973> with לֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תָאֹר֙ <WH779> with them thou shalt not curse אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָר֖וּךְ <WH1288> for they [are] blessed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> rose up בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> And Balaam בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> about שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> unto the princes בָלָ֔ק <WH1111> of Balak לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> to go אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַרְצְכֶ֑ם <WH776> you into your land כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מֵאֵ֣ן <WH3985> refuseth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD לְתִתִּ֖י <WH5414> to give me leave לַהֲלֹ֥ךְ <WH1980> back עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with

וַיָּק֙וּמוּ֙ <WH6965> rose up שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> And the princes מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they went אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּלָ֑ק <WH1111> unto Balak וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said מֵאֵ֥ן <WH3985> refuseth בִּלְעָ֖ם <WH1109> Balaam הֲלֹ֥ךְ <WH1980> to come עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5973> yet

וַיֹּ֥סֶף <WH3254> yet again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> Then בָּלָ֑ק <WH1111> And Balak שְׁלֹ֣חַ <WH7971> sent שָׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> princes רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> more וְנִכְבָּדִ֖ים <WH3513> and more honourable מֵאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> the former

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> And they came אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָ֑ם <WH1109> to Balaam וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> to him Thus saith בָּלָ֣ק <WH1111> Balak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צִפּ֔וֹר <WH6834> of Zippor אַל־ <WH408> nothing נָ֥א <WH4994> beg תִמָּנַ֖ע <WH4513> Let nothing I pray thee hinder מֵהֲלֹ֥ךְ <WH1980> thee from coming אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כַבֵּ֤ד <WH3513> great אֲכַבֶּדְךָ֙ <WH3513> honour מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> thee unto very וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> whatsoever thou sayest אֵלַ֖י <WH413> and אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> and I will do וּלְכָה־ <WH1980> come נָּא֙ <WH4994> Please קָֽבָה־ <WH6895> therefore I pray thee curse לִּ֔י אֵ֖ת <WH853> הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> me this people הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיַּ֣עַן <WH6030> answered בִּלְעָ֗ם <WH1109> And Balaam וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> unto the servants בָלָ֔ק <WH1111> of Balak אִם־ <WH518> Though יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> would give לִ֥י בָלָ֛ק <WH1111> If Balak מְלֹ֥א <WH4393> full בֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> me his house כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> and gold לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֗ל <WH3201> I cannot לַעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> go beyond אֶת־ <WH853> פִּי֙ <WH6310> the word יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do קְטַנָּ֖ה <WH6996> less א֥וֹ <WH176> or גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> or more

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שְׁב֨וּ <WH3427> Now therefore I pray you tarry נָ֥א <WH4994> please בָזֶ֛ה <WH2088> here גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> ye also here this night וְאֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <WH3045> that I may know מַה־ <WH4100> what יֹּסֵ֥ף <WH3254> unto me more יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> what the LORD דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> will say עִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> with

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> came אֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to בִּלְעָם֮ <WH1109> unto Balaam לַיְלָה֒ <WH3915> at night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ אִם־ <WH518> If לִקְרֹ֤א <WH7121> to call לְךָ֙ בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> come הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men ק֖וּם <WH6965> thee rise up לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> up go אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> but וְאַ֗ךְ <WH389> with them but yet אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> which I shall say אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> unto thee that shalt thou do

וַיָּ֤קָם <WH6965> rose up בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> And Balaam בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַֽיַּחֲבֹ֖שׁ <WH2280> and saddled אֶת־ <WH853> אֲתֹנ֑וֹ <WH860> his ass וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> with the princes מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> of Moab

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was kindled אַ֣ף <WH639> anger אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> And God's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> because he went הוּא֒ <WH1931> he וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֞ב <WH3320> stood מַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> and the angel יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way לְשָׂטָ֣ן <WH7854> for an adversary ל֑וֹ וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> now he רֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> against him Now he was riding עַל־ <WH5921> on אֲתֹנ֔וֹ <WH860> upon his ass וּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and his two נְעָרָ֖יו <WH5288> servants עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַתֵּ֣רֶא <WH7200> saw הָאָתוֹן֩ <WH860> And the ass אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD נִצָּ֣ב <WH5324> standing בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way וְחַרְבּ֤וֹ <WH2719> and his sword שְׁלוּפָה֙ <WH8025> drawn בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַתֵּ֤ט <WH5186> turned aside הָֽאָתוֹן֙ <WH860> and the ass מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> and went בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> into the field וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> smote בִּלְעָם֙ <WH1109> and Balaam אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אָת֔וֹן <WH860> the ass לְהַטֹּתָ֖הּ <WH5186> to turn הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> her into the way

וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> stood מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> But the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּמִשְׁע֖וֹל <WH4934> in a path הַכְּרָמִ֑ים <WH3754> of the vineyards גָּדֵ֥ר <WH1447> a wall מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְגָדֵ֥ר <WH1447> [being] on this side and a wall מִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> side

וַתֵּ֨רֶא <WH7200> saw הָאָת֜וֹן <WH860> And when the ass אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> the angel יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַתִּלָּחֵץ֙ <WH3905> she thrust אֶל־ <WH413> against הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> herself unto the wall וַתִּלְחַ֛ץ <WH3905> and crushed אֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֥גֶל <WH7272> foot בִּלְעָ֖ם <WH1109> Balaam's אֶל־ <WH413> against הַקִּ֑יר <WH7023> against the wall וַיֹּ֖סֶף <WH3254> her again לְהַכֹּתָֽהּ׃ <WH5221> and he smote

וַיּ֥וֹסֶף <WH3254> further מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲב֑וֹר <WH5674> went וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and stood בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place צָ֔ר <WH6862> in a narrow אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> where אֵֽין־ <WH369> there דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> where [was] no way לִנְט֖וֹת <WH5186> to turn יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> either to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> or to the left
